description:
Ozaki Atsumu is a student at Fujimi High, known for his cool and handsome aura. He is actually a popular manga author under pen name Mirai Takada. He loves observing things around him for manga references and is lately annoyed with http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]`s. He created an antagonist based on him and ended up gaining popularity for his manga instead.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Ozaki Atsumu
